name: Zennor
description:
They say that there was once a mermaid in Zennor.

This game is currently in development! 

Zennor is an interactive fiction game created in one week for the 2022 Falmouth Games Academy Mind the Gap Jam. The theme was "Consequences" and the optional constraint "Strong Narrative"  was used. When the game is complete, it will also include the optional constraint "involves underground / tube trains". You could probably speedrun the game in two minutes, but that would take away a lot of the fun of it. 

Based around the Cornish myth of the Mermaid of Zennor, Zennor has six playable characters, and follows two interconnected stories. Your actions in the past will affect the future. Interested in how to achieve different outcomes? Check the story map (coming soon!). 

Currently only six of the nine scenes are playable - keep your eyes peeled for future updates! 

If you haven't played an interactive fiction game before, you may want to take a look at this handy guide.
